segments.text: Tom , you promised to cut the lung . You won't forget , will you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And you'll repair the television , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And Tom , you will help Johnny with his homework , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll see . I will if I can but I won't promise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you'll promise not to be late for dinner tonight , won't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But only if you ask me nicely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tom , darling . You'll try not to be late for dinner tonight , won't you ? Please !
segments.speaker: S1
